name: Goblin

attacks.name: Stab
attacks.description: A quick stab with a rusty dagger.

attacks.name: Throw Rock
attacks.description: Hurls a small rock at the target.

behavior: Aggressive but cowardly. Flees when health is low.

name: Stone Golem

attacks.name: Crush
attacks.description: A powerful slam with its stone fists.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.description: Stomps the ground, causing tremors that damage all enemies.

behavior: Slow but relentless. Immune to status effects.

name: Fire Elemental

attacks.name: Fireball
attacks.description: Hurls a blazing fireball at the target.

attacks.name: Flame Wave
attacks.description: Sends a wave of fire in a wide arc.

behavior: Aggressive and unpredictable. Burns nearby enemies over time.

name: Dire Wolf

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: A ferocious bite that tears through flesh.

attacks.name: Howl
attacks.description: Unnerving howl that lowers the enemy's morale, reducing their attack power.

behavior: Hunts in packs. Prefers to ambush its prey.

name: Bandit Leader

attacks.name: Slash
attacks.description: A powerful slash with a steel sword.

attacks.name: Counter
attacks.description: Parries an attack and counters with a quick strike.

behavior: Tactical and ruthless. Uses dirty tricks to gain the upper hand.

name: Ancient Dragon

attacks.name: Dragon Breath
attacks.description: A devastating blast of fire that engulfs all enemies.

attacks.name: Tail Swipe
attacks.description: A crushing blow from the dragon's massive tail.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
attacks.description: A powerful gust of wind that knocks enemies back.

behavior: A legendary creature of immense power. Extremely aggressive and territorial.

name: Skeleton Warrior

attacks.name: Bone Strike
attacks.description: A heavy strike with a rusted sword.

attacks.name: Shield Bash
attacks.description: Bashes the enemy with a skeletal shield.

behavior: Relentless and unfeeling. Will fight until destroyed.
